attributes.action: declare to the public how many times members of his government (included Tony Blair's cabinet) have attended the Bilderberg Group and what was discussed there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bilderg Group is a secret organisation which holds annual meetings around the world.

These meetings are not open to the public. However, the public have every right to be concerned as some of the most powerful people in the world attend. These include individuals from the spheres of politics, business and media.

Leaked lists of attendees have suggested that British royalty as well as former Prime Minister's and Chancellor's have attended.

The people have a right to know which members of the House of Commons and Her Majesty's Government attended. Additionally, what was discussed and what decisions were made about the direction of liberty and events here in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
